text.headline: Bachelor's in Computer Engineering Conferred!
text.text: Completed Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science from Mumbai University and mastered a diverse range of subjects including web design, database management, cloud computing, AI & ML.

text.headline: A Fresh Face in AI
text.text: Debuted at Quantiphi, an award-winning Applied AI and Software Services company, as a Business Analyst in June 2019. My role could be summed up better as a 'Synthetic Unicorn', a term coined by Quantiphi to underline a remarkable professional with in-depth expertise in data engineering, statistics and business, collaborating to chase innovation

text.headline: Navigating the Clouds
text.text: Successfully completed Google Cloud Platform (GCP) Associate Cloud Engineer certification, demonstrating proficiency in using GCP tools and services to migrate and deploy applications, monitor resource utilization, and ensure security and compliance

text.headline: Data Savvy and Certified
text.text: Completed the Tableau Desktop Specialist certification, demonstrating expertise in utilizing the Tableau platform to effectively create, manage, and publish interactive data visualizations and dashboards. Acquired advanced skills in delivering data-driven insights to drive informed decisions for businesses.

text.headline: Transitioning to a Leadership Role
text.text: This involved extracting lab parameters from pdf reports received by Tata 1mg. An inhouse solution Lab Labeler was devised using Airflow & AWS Lambda digitizing 4k reports/hour

text.headline: The American Dream
text.text: Enrolled in Northeastern University to pursue a Master's degree in Information Systems. Focused on advancing my skills in the development of intelligent applications and scaling through cloud computing technology, while immersing myself in the diverse cultural tapestry of one of America's most vibrant cities
